keywords: ['instrumental song', 'tribal feel', 'didgeridoo', 'hand pan', 'droning sound', 'simple melody', 'no other instruments', 'no voices']
caption: This instrumental song features a didgeridoo being played by the vibrating of the lips. This features a continuous droning sound inter-spread with bass sounds. This is accompanied by a handpan playing the percussion and backing notes. This song can be played in a movie featuring a tribal initiation ritual.
